title: Strict law enforcement against violent protestors
body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); Sri Lanka Police said the law will be strictly enforced against violent protesters.
Senior DIG, Senior Police Spokesman Ajith Rohana requested protestors to hold the protests peacefully.
(VIDEO) Police fire tear gas and water cannons on IUSF protest near Parliament
Galle Face Protest : Additional Magistrate orders police to refer request to Chief Magistrate
